title.narrative: OUTPUT 1: COMMUNITY ACTION FOR TOTAL SANITATION

description.narrative: Community Action for Total Sanitation triggered to achieve Open Defecation Free status for villages in target districts, which contributes to Hygiene, Sanitation. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: Adolescent girls and boys, mothers and fathers, and community leaders in 106 districts adopt 11 key life-saving, care and protective behaviours for children and women

participating-org.narrative: GENERAL AUTHORITY FOR RURAL WATER PROJECTS SAADA

sector.narrative: Sanitation - eliminating open defecation in peri-urban and urban communities

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Community Action for Total Sanitation triggered to achieve Open Defecation Free status for villages in target districts
